metadata.synopsis: Player finds a group of goblin kids throwing stones at a bear, spurred on by their mother. The bear is the arch druid Halsin, in bear form. He won't make this apparent to the player, even if they have Speak with Animals.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 400 -374. Approach the group before the Bear's cage (prison)

97.speaker: Three
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The bear is tucked away in a corner, trying to make himself small.InternalNodeContext: default - not met, didn't speak about leaving the captiveNodeContext: excited/in awe because he made a bear squeal.

71.speaker: One
71.context: NodeContext: Giggle before the line. She's excited because the woman makes noises when they throw stones at her.

36.speaker: Brawler Birka
36.context: NodeContext: stern - she's trying to turn this torture into a learning experience for the kids.

27.speaker: Three
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Three picks up a stone and throws it, hitting the bear in its faceNodeContext: A little humph of excertion while Three throws the stone.

91.speaker: Halsin
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks up at us, growling in pain.

81.speaker: Halsin
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks up at us, growling in pain.

85.speaker: One
85.text: Again! Again! Make it squeal again!

43.speaker: Player
43.text: What the hells are you doing?
43.context: NodeContext: first node surprised that you would stop her, as she thinks you're on her side. second node more annoyed.  She assumes that by explaining, you'll understand why they are hurting this woman.

93.speaker: Brawler Birka
93.text: We're juicing it up. The beast came in here with those robbers. Killed Dink - and Mince, too.
93.context: NodeContext: first node surprised that you would stop her, as she thinks you're on her side. second node more annoyed.  She assumes that by explaining, you'll understand why they are hurting this woman.

49.speaker: Brawler Birka
49.text: Boss's thinkin' of servin' it to the worgs.
49.context: NodeContext: fyi, the worg cage is to the left of the cage that holds the bear. if the player is infront of the goblin mother, she might wave her right hand in that genirall direction.

30.speaker: One
30.context: NodeContext: Very excited. Not scared at all.

10.speaker: Three
10.text: Look, look, you'll see. Gimme that rock. I'll show ya!
10.context: NodeContext: the child is excited., he makes a sweep towards the ground picking up a stone in there hand. this will happen out of shot.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Go on, then. Keep at it.

59.speaker: Brawler Birka
59.text: What're ya - get lost if you can't stand a bit of rough-housin'.

1.speaker: Player
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: Speak with animals line

53.speaker: Halsin
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: Speak with animals line

4.speaker: Halsin
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: SFX only - Halsin in bear form - do not voice record

19.speaker: Halsin
19.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The bear must lunges forward, to breaking down the gate
~The gate slams crushes mother goblin

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Throw a rock at the bear.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: Speak with Animals line

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Side with the freed bear - attack the goblin jailers.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Leave the bear to the goblin's mercy.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: Speak with Animals line

70.speaker: Halsin
70.text: You chose. You die with them.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] animal constructionsNodeContext: Speak with Animals line

82.speaker: Halsin
82.context: NodeContext: SFX only - Halsin in bear form. Do not voice record.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: How about a taste of your own medicine?

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Release the bear immediately or face my wrath!

25.text: All right, all right, if you're gonna throw a tantrum about it. Never seen someone so worked up over a stupid animal.

44.speaker: Brawler Birka
44.text: All right, all right, if you're gonna throw a tantrum about it. Never seen someone so worked up over a stupid animal.

47.speaker: Brawler Birka
47.text: We'll be the ones squealing if we piss off the bear-hugger.

65.speaker: Brawler Birka
65.text: Hope you can control the furry bastard.

5.speaker: Player
5.context: NodeContext: first node surprised that you would stop her, as she thinks you're on her side. second node more annoyed.  She assumes that by explaining, you'll understand why they are hurting this woman.

75.speaker: Brawler Birka
75.text: It's stayin' right 'ere. The beast came in here with those robbers. Killed Dink - and Mince, too.
75.context: NodeContext: first node surprised that you would stop her, as she thinks you're on her side. second node more annoyed.  She assumes that by explaining, you'll understand why they are hurting this woman.

51.speaker: Brawler Birka
51.text: Boss's thinkin' of servin' it to the worgs. But first, Three, more stones. Make it nice an' bloody.
51.context: NodeContext: first node surprised that you would stop her, as she thinks you're on her side. second node more annoyed.  She assumes that by explaining, you'll understand why they are hurting this woman.

89.speaker: One
89.text: Yeah! Hit its head! I wanna hear more noises!

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
8.context: NodeContext: We're threathening her and she's having none of it.

114.speaker: Player
114.context: NodeContext: We're threathening her and she's having none of it.

39.speaker: Brawler Birka
39.context: NodeContext: We're threathening her and she's having none of it.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Go on, then. Aim for his eye.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear rears up on it's hind legs (if possible, otherwise starts taking up more space) and roars in anger.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

115.speaker: Player
115.text: I'm putting an end to this. Now.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear rears up on it's hind legs (if possible, otherwise starts taking up more space) and roars in anger.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

96.speaker: Halsin
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear rears up on it's hind legs (if possible, otherwise starts taking up more space) and roars in anger.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

88.speaker: Halsin
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear rears up on it's hind legs (if possible, otherwise starts taking up more space) and roars in anger.

66.speaker: Brawler Birka
66.text: I - I mean no disrespect, just - these are the boss' orders. I can't let it out for no one but a True Soul.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Then I'll just have to kill you.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Fine. Do what you want with him.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: You will free the beast for me.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: You will free the beast for me.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*
41.context: NodeContext: She just realised you are way higher in rank and she was talking down to you.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Let him out. I'll take care of the beast.
28.context: NodeContext: She just realised you are way higher in rank and she was talking down to you.

98.speaker: Brawler Birka
98.text: Oh, you're - uh, y-yes, of course.
98.context: NodeContext: She just realised you are way higher in rank and she was talking down to you.

57.speaker: Brawler Birka
57.text: Oh, y-you're also - Y-yes, of course.
57.context: NodeContext: She just realised you are way higher in rank and she was talking down to you.

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
77.context: NodeContext: Put off and whiny - someone just told her to stop torturing the woman, and she doesn't like it.

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... It's taking something you'll never get back.*
83.context: NodeContext: Put off and whiny - someone just told her to stop torturing the woman, and she doesn't like it.

50.speaker: Narrator
50.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
50.context: NodeContext: Put off and whiny - someone just told her to stop torturing the woman, and she doesn't like it.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*
0.context: NodeContext: Put off and whiny - someone just told her to stop torturing the woman, and she doesn't like it.

13.speaker: One
13.text: But - but I wanna hear it squeal!
13.context: NodeContext: Put off and whiny - someone just told her to stop torturing the woman, and she doesn't like it.

110.speaker: Brawler Birka
110.text: One! That's a True Soul you're talkin' to. Show some respect!

111.speaker: One
111.text: S-sorry, True Soul. I'll open the cage for ya.
111.context: NodeContext: She's talking to someone of much higher rank, and things didn't go smoothly. She's afraid of what you will do if she displeases you.

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

109.speaker: Narrator
109.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'soon'.*

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Let him out. I'll take care of the beast.

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Sharper stones might cut through all that fur.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] Three picks up a stone and throws it, hitting the bear in its faceNodeContext: Triumphant hump of excertion

100.speaker: Three
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] Three picks up a stone and throws it, hitting the bear in its faceNodeContext: Triumphant hump of excertion

90.speaker: Halsin
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear whimpers as the stone hits him and looks at us directly, as if begging us to help it.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

69.speaker: Halsin
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear whimpers as the stone hits him and looks at us directly, as if begging us to help it.

35.speaker: Player
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks at our backs as we turn away, as if begging us to help it.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

64.speaker: Halsin
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks at our backs as we turn away, as if begging us to help it.NodeContext: Speak with animals line

45.speaker: Halsin
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks at our backs as we turn away, as if begging us to help it.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: That's it. I'm putting a stop to this.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player picks up a rock and chucks it at the bear. The bear roars in anger.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Throw a rock at the bear.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player picks up a rock and chucks it at the bear. The bear roars in anger.

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: You chose. You die with them.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player picks up a rock and chucks it at the bear. The bear roars in anger.

3.text: You chose. You die with them.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player picks up a rock and chucks it at the bear. The bear roars in anger.

54.speaker: Halsin
54.text: You chose. You die with them.
